Step_Description.Step_Description_label: From the Windows file explorer, create the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts directory
In the Orchestra Framework, create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Orchestra" category
In the variable viewer, add the FileSystem directory "D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts" to the "ArtefactPath" variable
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOrchestraFramework" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdiOffice" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
In the context viewer, right click on the "AdminContext" context and select "Set as current context"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: In the context viewer, the "AdminContext" is displayed in bold

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: From the Windows file explorer, create the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts\Doc directory
Create a OFText.txt file in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts
Create a OFWord.doc file in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts\Doc
In the Orchestra Explorer, click on the refresh icon

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Explorer displays two artefact types : "Text" and "Word"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Unfold the "Text" artefact type
Unfold the "Word" artefact type
From the Windows file explorer, create the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts directory
Create a "Test.txt" text file within the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts directory
From the Windows file explorer, create the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts2 directory
Create a "Test.txt" text file within the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts2 directory
In the Orchestra Framework, create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Orchestra" category
In the variable viewer, add the FileSystem directories "D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts" and "D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts2" to the "ArtefactPath" variable
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOrchestraFramework" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
In the context viewer, right click on the "AdminContext" context and select "Set as current context"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: An warning message pops up "Retrieving root artefacts generated some problems"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Details >>" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The following message is displayed "The artefact 'orchestra://Text/Test.txt' is not unique within the following environments FS : [D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts, D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts2]

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: From the Windows file explorer, create the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts directory
Create a "Test.txt" text file within the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts directory
In the Orchestra Framework, create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Orchestra" category
In the variable viewer, add the FileSystem directory "D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts" to the "ArtefactPath" variable and add a valid ConfigurationDirectories path
Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
In the context viewer, right click on the "AdminContext" context and select "Set as current context"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: In the context viewer, the "AdminContext" is displayed in bold. The Orchestra Explorer displays one artefact type : "Text"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Unfold the "Text" artefact type
From the Windows file explorer, edit the DefaultConnectorsAssociation.xml file and replace <artifact1 tool="Text">*</artifact1> with <artifact1 tool="Text">OrchestraTest/*</artifact1>
In the context viewer, right click on the "AdminContext" context and select "Set as current context"
In the Orchestra Explorer, click on the refresh icon

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Explorer displays one artefact type : "Text"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Unfold the "Text" artefact type
